page.title: 07UNDER THE POLICEMANS ARM
page.content: The games we play at home and school is Under The Police mans Arm.You play it like this.Sombody goes on it and he or she counts to about"10"so when that person touches you you stand and hold your arm out but if somebody goes under you before the person touches you then you are free.If the person "on it"touches you he or she must stand and hold their arm out as well that person who is "on it"until he catches everybody. Then the last one caught is on it. Stuck in the Mud As well as Under the Police mans Arm we play Stuck in the Mud. Some of it is like Under the police mans Arm. Somebody is " on it" and they count to 15 in ones and they start running around after you. When they touch you have to open your legs and (cont.p.8)
